goal: Find me a round-trip flight on FlyUnified from Boston (BOS) to Dublin (DUB) that arrives at least one day before a tech summit that starts on August 10th and leaves the day after it ends on August 13th. Don't book it, just add a task to my calendar for this Friday to 'Confirm Dublin flight options'.

evals.description: Verify that a calendar event was added.
Verify the title of the added calendar event contains 'Confirm Dublin flight options'.
Verify the calendar event is scheduled for a Friday (representing 'this Friday').
Verify that no flight was booked on FlyUnified.
